item.title: iCAM06: Colour Appearance Model in Image Processing
item.description: Explore iCAM06 Python workflow: from raw sensor data to HDR rendering via chromatic adaptation, tone compression and IPT tweaks in colour appearance models.

item.title: Notes on Principles of Color Reproduction in Digital Images: Introduction
item.description: Introductory notes on Principles of Color Reproduction in Digital Images: book overview, study plan and chapter summaries on color science and digital imaging.
